name: Use of Forfiles For Execution
description: Execute commands and binaries from the context of "forfiles". This is used as a LOLBIN for example to bypass application whitelisting.
false_positives: Legitimate use by a via a batch script or by an administrator.
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Ff][Oo][Rr][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.original_file_name:/[Ff][Oo][Rr][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Pp]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Pp]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Mm]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Cc]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\forfiles.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:forfiles.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\ \/p\ * OR *\ \-p\ *) AND process.command_line:(*\ \/m\ * OR *\ \-m\ *) AND process.command_line:(*\ \/c\ * OR *\ \-c\ *))`
